cart_redirect.comment: Default is cart, custom redirect must not go to any checkout page

klarna_language.label: Language
klarna_language.comment: Can be used if site is in a different language than the official language of current country

extra_order_attribute.label: Extra order ID attribute
extra_order_attribute.comment: Will be used in the orderid2 field on the Klarna order

allow_separate_address.comment: Allow shipping address to be different from billing address. You might need acceptance from Klarna if activated

enable_trigger_changed_js.label: Enable javascript trigger for address update

auto_register_guest.label: Automatically register guests on checkout
auto_register_guest.comment: If disabled and Guest Checkout is allowed in Magento Checkout Options, orders will be placed as guests.

user_defined_json.label: User Defined Variables
user_defined_json.comment: JSON encoded array. Please consult Klarna before using this, incorrect information may cause the integration to stop working

heading_https_only.label: Only when https is activated in checkout

enable_validation.label: Enable Validation of Order before Klarna proceeds
enable_validation.comment: An extra validation is made for the cart, stock levels for example, just before the order is created in Klarna.

create_order_on_validation.label: Create order on Validation
create_order_on_validation.comment: Create pending order on Validation and only update it when completed.

enable_postcode_update.label: Enable tax and shipping updates
enable_postcode_update.comment: Klarna contacts Magento to recalculate taxes and shippment amounts when address is updated.

enable_other_button.label: Enabled
enable_other_button.comment: If enabled, one button will be placed on klarna checkout page and one in the payment section of standard checkout

label_other_button.label: Label for Other Payment Methods button
label_other_button.comment: This can be free text or a complete URL to a reasonably sized image

label_back_button.label: Label for Back to Klarna Checkout button
label_back_button.comment: This can be free text or a complete URL to a reasonably sized image

auto_reset_other_method_button.label: Automatically reactivate Klarna Checkout
auto_reset_other_method_button.comment: If enabled, it will go to Klarna Checkout next time checkout is requested, if user exits standard checkout by going to another page. Attention! If there are many customizations in standard checkout, it might cause this reactivation as well!

explicit_usage.label: Only run Klarma Checkout if Explicitly called
explicit_usage.comment: If set to Yes, and you go to checkout without any customisation, it will go to standard checkout rather than Klarna Checkout by default

enable_newsletter.label: Enabled
enable_newsletter.comment: If checkbox for newsletter should be shown in checkout page.

allowed_ip_range.label: Enable for IP range (last digit)
allowed_ip_range.comment: Specify 2 numbers between 0 and 255, separated by dash. Example: '0-50'. Empty value enables all IP addresses

allow_when_logged_in.label: Enable for logged in Customers
allow_when_logged_in.comment: If not enabled, logged in customers will use standard Magento checkout

allow_customer_group.label: Enable for specific customer groups
allow_customer_group.comment: If you do not belong to a selected customer group, standard Magento checkout will be used. None selected, means enabled for all

heading_api_v3x_only.label: Specific for API V.3x (US and UK)

shipping_countries.label: Shipping Countries
shipping_countries.comment: List of allowed shipping countries. If none selected, none will be supported. List will appear in Klarna Checkout

shipping_options.label: Include Shipping Options
shipping_options.comment: List of available shipping options that should appear in Klarna Checkout.

vaimo_klarna_fee_tax_class.label: Tax class for Klarna invoice fee

vaimo_klarna_fee_includes_tax.label: Klarna invoice fee prices
vaimo_klarna_fee_includes_tax.comment: Whether Klarna invoice fee set in admin includes tax
